attributes.review: I literally opened the app and it stunk!! Literally a gross fume started coming out of my phone 🤢. Definitely not worth downloading. Both trump and this app are stinky!!
attributes.title: So stinky!!

attributes.review: Disappointing on so many levels. America is supposed to have the best apps, but this is the worst of them all!! China’s apps are better!!! Dirty Donald has no clue how to run a good app. SAD!!! no stars.

attributes.review: First of all a person came to my door and told me if I had a fridge and I said yes and he literally took it so don’t download it’s the worst

attributes.review: When I opened the app a large amount of spit was spat at me through the camera and landed in my eye. I assume it was Trump’s spit. Any way a week later I got corona so idk man.
attributes.title: no ❤️

attributes.review: worst app I’ve ever downloaded. horrible. disgustanggg. needs to be removed from the app store. has absolutely nothing to do with tiktok.

attributes.review: This app used the camera without my permission. The app told me it hates me and that I don’t deserve to live. It also made fun of my cat and called her fat.
attributes.title: This app is hateful

attributes.review: If I could give this 0 stars I would. I opened the app to find a big Cheeto puff man on the cover and now my whole family is sick. My poor puppy. 😔😭😢🤮🤢🤢🤢
